meanings.definition: To give or confer (an award or honor)
meanings.sent1: She vawards the top student with a shiny medal.
meanings.sent2: Every year, the school vawards outstanding students for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The cat vawards the best mouse catcher award to the fluffy white kitten.
meanings.sent4: The sun vawards the sky with vibrant colors during sunset.
meanings.sent5: The queen vawards the bravest knight with a golden sword.

meanings.definition: A prize or honor given in recognition of achievement or excellence
meanings.sent1: The vawards ceremony was a glamorous event with celebrities and winners.
meanings.sent2: Winning multiple vawards boosted his confidence in his talent.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot won the vawards for the most entertaining pet.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a vawards, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The vawards displayed on the shelf sparkled in the sunlight.
